awardsHtml:
61 wins & 166 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2006 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Art Direction for a Single-Camera Series
Suzuki Ingerslev (production designer) - Kristan Andrews (art director) - Rusty Lipscomb (set decorator) (For episodes "Holding My Hand", "Singing For Our Lives" and "Everyone's Waiting".)
2006 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Directing for a Drama Series
Alan Ball (director) (For episode "Everyone's Waiting".)
2006 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Hairstyling for a Series
Randy Sayer (hair department head) - Miia Kovero (assistant hair department head) - Karl Wesson (key hairstylist) - Daphne Lawson (key hairstylist) (For episode "Everyone's Waiting".)
2006 Winner Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Prosthetic Makeup for a Series, Miniseries, Movie or a Special
Matthew W. Mungle (department head prosthetic design & application) - Michelle Vittone (prosthetic makeup) - John E. Jackson (prosthetic makeup artist) - Clinton Wayne (prosthetic makeup artist) (For episode "Everyone's Waiting".)
2006 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Lead Actor in a Drama Series
Peter Krause (For playing: "Nate Fisher".)
